I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
I'm going to make a banana smoothie to help me recover from my workout and then head to the bar to check on things.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
My day is going well! I just finished teaching online and am now getting ready for dinner.
Oh that's nice! I'm about to go workout then head to my bar to check on things.
That sounds like a great day! What do you do at your bar?
I'm the owner! It's a small coffee shop/bar.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to open my own business.
It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I am, it's definitely a lot of fun.
Have you been in business for long?
Just a few years, but it's been going well so far.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks!
So what made you want to open a bar?
I've always loved coffee and I've always wanted to own my own business. So I figured why not combine the two?
That's a great idea! I love coffee too.
Me too! It's the best.
So what's your favorite kind of coffee?
I love a good latte. How about you?
I love lattes too! But I also love cappuccinos.
Cappuccinos are good too
